definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Position child with head of bed slightly elevated to decrease cerebral edema; monitor administration of fluids.
sentences.chinese: 卧床时，床头略微抬高，减少脑水肿，监视补液情况。

sentences.english: Conclusion The victim died suddenly after a person being untied because the cerebral e…
sentences.chinese: 结论受害者松绑后即死主要是脑水肿即刻加重的结果。

sentences.english: Evaluate the anti-action of Aprotinin in ischemic brain edema.
sentences.chinese: 评价抑肽酶对缺血性脑水肿的抑制作用。

sentences.english: Merge the brain contusion and laceration more to harm or after the hair brain dropsy, the condition aggravate.
sentences.chinese: 多合并脑挫裂伤或者继发性脑水肿，病情加重。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the influence of mannitol on brain edema after cerebral hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨甘露醇对脑出血后脑水肿的影响。

sentences.english: Nimodipine can inhibit the formation of brain edema.
sentences.chinese: 尼莫地平有干预脑水肿形成的作用。

sentences.english: Symptoms of cerebral edema mirror other brain conditions such as tumors and concussions.
sentences.chinese: 脑水肿可诱发其他大脑疾病，如脑肿瘤和脑震荡。

sentences.english: Results Brain edema and brain herniation caused by epidural hematoma lead to the death.
sentences.chinese: 结果死者系硬膜外血肿致脑水肿并脑疝而死亡。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss some related factors of the self-injury caused by diffuse brain edema.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨弥漫性脑水肿引起自伤的相关因素。

sentences.english: The treatment of brain edema type is using hyperosmotic dehydration as core.
sentences.chinese: 脑水肿型以高渗脱水剂为主。

sentences.english: The micro-damage puncture could reduce the formation of brain edema after ICH.
sentences.chinese: 微创血肿清除术能改善脑出血后的脑水肿形成。

sentences.english: Methods Research on the identification material of self-injury caused by diffuse brain dedma.
sentences.chinese: 方法对弥漫性脑水肿引起自伤的鉴定资料进行研究。

sentences.english: Moreover, the pathological examination revealed lung and brain edema in the dialyzed dogs.
sentences.chinese: 此外，病理检查显示，肺及脑水肿，在透析狗。

sentences.english: Acute infection caused by transient cerebral edema and cerebral hypoxia.
sentences.chinese: 急性感染时造成暂时性脑水肿和脑缺氧。

sentences.english: In severe cases, it can lead to cerebral edema and even death.
sentences.chinese: 情况严重时，会造成脑水肿甚至死亡。

sentences.english: There are two types of brain edema: cytotoxic and vasogenic edemas.
sentences.chinese: 脑水肿分细胞性和血管性两类。

definition: hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
